turn.6: Portugal Day celebrations were officially suspended during the Carnation Revolution in 1974.
turn.8: Celebrations resumed after 1974 and were expanded to include the "Comunidades Portuguesas", Portuguese emigrants and their descendants living in communities all around the world.
